title: 2001 Buy.com Tour
text:
The 2001 Buy.com Tour season ran from Mar 8 to October 28. The season consisted of 28 official money <a href="golf">golf</a> tournaments, and one canceled tournament. Two tournaments were played outside of the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>. The <a href="2001%20Buy.com%20Tour%20graduates">top 15 players</a> on the year-end money list earned their <a href="PGA%20Tour">PGA Tour</a> card for <a href="2002%20PGA%20Tour">2002</a>. 
Schedule.
The number in parentheses after winners' names show the player's total number of wins on the tour including that event. No one accumulates many wins on the tour because success at this level soon leads to promotion to the PGA Tour.
Leading money winners.
"<a href="https%3A//web.archive.org/web/20111003002312/http%3A//www.pgatour.com/h/stats/info/%3F109">Full money list</a>"
